ma4
HSK 5: 骂,罵
HSK 6: 蚂,螞
(Trad.: 禡)
(Trad.: 禡)
Freq: 8319
读音mà ，形声。从示，马声。从示，与祭祀、鬼神有关。用作姓氏，古时亦作行军时在军队驻扎处举行的祭祀之意。
该姓源于山东即墨，祃、㐷，同出一族。家谱记载，祖上本姓马，因与同朝为官的赵姓官员有隙，赵姓官员为羞辱马姓，故意雇佣一马姓人看坟茔。祖上遂将马姓加上前面的偏旁，以寓意福祉、人丁兴旺。故有祃、㐷二姓氏。其中祃一族迁徙至河北省东光县，村落与山东仅一河之隔。分为大祃家口、小祃家口两个隔河而立的村庄，估计该姓氏总人口约2000人左右。
Pronunciation mà, pictophonetic. Cong Shi, Ma Sheng. Congshi is related to sacrifices, ghosts and gods. Used as a surname, in ancient times, it was also used as a sacrificial ritual at the army station during the march.
The surname originated in Jimo, Shandong, and they belonged to the same family. The family tree records that the ancestor's surname was Ma, because of a gap with the official surnamed Zhao, who was an official in the same dynasty, the official surnamed Zhao deliberately hired a person surnamed Ma to look at the tomb in order to humiliate the surname Ma. The ancestors added the Ma's surname to the front side to imply well-being and prosperity. So there are two surnames: Zhu and 㐷. Among them, the Yi people migrated to Dongguang County, Hebei Province, and the village is separated from Shandong by a river. Divided into two villages across the river, Dahujiakou and Xiaozhenjiakou, it is estimated that the total population of this surname is about 2,000.

祃字的基本解释

祃
（禡）
mà
古代行军在军队驻扎的地方举行的祭礼：祃牙（古代军队出发举行祭牙旗之礼）。

祃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mà］
［《廣韻》莫駕切，去禡，明。］
“祃1”的繁体字。“貉4”的被通假字。
古代在军队驻地举行的祭礼。

Basic explanation of words
祃
(sacrifice to god of war)
mà
The ancient marching ceremony held in the place where the army was stationed: Fangya (the ancient army set off to hold the ceremony for the sacrifice of the tooth flag).
